leve.name: Blinded by the Wight
leve.description:
Nighttime patrols have proven hazardous of late, with many returning to camp hours─sometimes days─later with tales of snow white hinds, roads that wind like curls of wood, and faithless constellations. Clearly, some infernal creature is in need of an escort back to hell.

(Begin by surprising a wind sprite with a /poke, then slay the glowing figure to acquire luminous crystals. Use these items on beasts to see through their guises.)
leve.client: The Order of the Twin Adder Red Otters
